scripts.postinstall: echo "Skipping postinstall to prevent infinite loop. Run 'pnpm install' in the frontend directory manually."
scripts.start: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "cd backend && .\.venv\Scripts\Activate && python -m uvicorn server:app --reload" "cd frontend && pnpm start"
